Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, we're extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this product at a special introductory price of $14000. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible experience while ensuring you get the most out of your investment. Don't miss this chance to elevate your [specific area of use] to new heights. Let's discuss how we can make this happen! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
